channel.title: Strapi on Rupak Ganguly
channel.description: Recent content in Strapi on Rupak Ganguly

item.title: How to create a Strapi CMS app to manage content
item.description: In this article, we will create a Strapi-powered app, to manage content using the Strapi CMS. To manage the content, we will use the Strapi Dashboard Admin UI to create the content types, create content data, set roles and permissions, and then expose the content via automatically generated APIs. Finally, we will access the APIs to retrieve the content data.

item.title: What Is Strapi Headless CMS?
item.description: Strapi is an open-source headless CMS, and comes in three flavors: open-source Community Edition, self-hosted paid Enterprise Edition and fully managed Strapi Cloud. There is a marketplace for adding various integrations and plugins to enhance the base feature set.
